## Properties

| **Property**              | **Values**      | **Default**       |
| ------------------------- | --------------- | ----------------- |
| Has start icon `Boolean`  | `true \| false` | `true`            |
| Start icon `InstanceSwap` | `Any icon`      | `alert-02-filled` |
| Label `Text`              | `string`        | `Label`           |
| Has action `Boolean`      | `true \| false` | `true`            |

## When to use

{<svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" style={{ display: 'inline', verticalAlign: 'middle' }}><path d="M5 13l4 4L19 7" style={{ stroke: "var(--color-text-positive)" }} strokeWidth="2" /></svg>} When providing brief, non-intrusive feedback about an action, such as confirming a saved change or a sent message. <br/>
{<svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" style={{ display: 'inline', verticalAlign: 'middle' }}><path d="M5 13l4 4L19 7" style={{ stroke: "var(--color-text-positive)" }} strokeWidth="2" /></svg>} When the message is temporary and does not require user intervention to dismiss. <br/><br/>
{<svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" style={{ display: 'inline', verticalAlign: 'middle' }}><path d="M6 6L18 18M6 18L18 6" style={{ stroke: "var(--color-text-negative)" }} strokeWidth="2" /></svg>} If the message is critical and requires immediate attention, use an alert or dialog instead. <br/>
{<svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" style={{ display: 'inline', verticalAlign: 'middle' }}><path d="M6 6L18 18M6 18L18 6" style={{ stroke: "var(--color-text-negative)" }} strokeWidth="2" /></svg>} If the user needs to take an action that isnâ€™t time-sensitive. <br/>
